origins.name: Lunar
origins.desc: Moonlight transforms unit durability into a win condition for team comps that are built with drawn out battles in mind.

origins.name: Crystal
origins.desc: Crystal Champions have a maximum amount of damage they can take from a single hit.

origins.name: Electric
origins.desc: Electric Champions shock nearby enemies whenever they deal or receive a critical strike

origins.name: Inferno
origins.desc: Inferno spell damage and critical strikes burns the ground beneath the target, dealing a percent of that spell's pre-mitigation damage as magic damage over 4 seconds

origins.name: Light
origins.desc: When a Light Champion dies, all other Light Champions gain Attack Speed and are healed for 20% of their Maximum Health

origins.name: Ocean
origins.desc: All allies restore mana every 4 seconds

origins.name: Glacial
origins.desc: Basic Attacks from Glacials have 25% chance to stun their target for 1.5 seconds, bonus Magic Damage on stun.

origins.name: Shadow
origins.desc: Shadow units deal increased damage for 6 seconds at combat start, refreshed on takedown.

origins.name: Steel
origins.desc: Steel Champions gain damage immunity for a few seconds when they are reduced below 50% health

classes.name: Berserker
classes.desc: Innate: At the start of combat, Berserkers leap to the nearest enemy. Berserkers have a chance to hit all units in a cone in front of them with their attacks

classes.name: Mage
classes.desc: Mages have a chance on cast to instead Doublecast

classes.name: Assassin
classes.desc: Innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the farthest enemy. Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance.

classes.name: Blademaster
classes.desc: Blademaster Basic Attacks have a 40% chance to trigger additional attacks against their target. These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

classes.name: Mystic
classes.desc: All allies gain increased Magic Resist

classes.name: Ranger
classes.desc: Every 3 seconds, Rangers have a chance to double their Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

classes.name: Summoner
classes.desc: Summoned units have increased health and duration
